definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_is_tagged_in"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tag"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">verse:canparry</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">if (!entity.level().isClientSide()) {&#10;					// Server side - send packet to all clients&#10;					PacketDistributor.sendToPlayersTrackingEntity(entity, new PlayPlayerAnimationMessage(entity.getId(), "verse:rapidpunches", true, true));&#10;					VerseMod.LOGGER.info("Sent animation packet for zombie ID: " + entity.getId());&#10;				}</field></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
